titleStmt.title: A treatise of the knovvledge of God, as excellently as compendiously handled by the famous and learned divine, Peter Du Moulin, late minister of the Reformed Church in Paris, and professor of theologie in the Vniversitie of Sedan. Faithfully translated out of the originall by Robert Codrington, Master of Arts
De cognitione Dei. English
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658.
Codrington, Robert, 1601-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. M[athewes] and are to be sold by William Sheares, at the signe of the Harrow in Britaines-Bursse, and at his shop neere Yorke-house,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
